reviews.review_msg: Anne was the most disorganized and I've ever had. her lectures were literally her reading a speech with the worst possible visual aids ever as her powerpoints that were the least bit helpful. she is so technologically impaired it hurt my soul watching her try to figure things out. So rude she whistled at students who were taking notes on laptops

Professor Everton's 111W class is challenging but worth it. His engaging lectures and useful feedback make it a rewarding experience. For study prep, tools like unstuck AI and the free textbook are super helpful.
He's definitely a good professor but if you're looking for a GPA booster, this course isn't it if you're not a strong writer.

Michael Everton is super chill and funny, and he communicates information clearly and effectively. Your TA has more direct influence on your grade than he does. Don't skip his lectures, they provide context on readings that you can't find elsewhere, which means self-study isn't really an option (at least in this course)

He's a great prof with engaging and hillarious lectures. There's reading quizzes every week (worth 2.5% of grade) and tutorials are accounted for overall grade. There's only 2 big essays and a final exam for grades which is pretty light. But if you're taking this class thinking it's an easy A, trust me it's not unless you're a writing god.

Michael Everton has been my favourite prof at SFU so far. Really funny, explains all the concepts in great detail with examples, reviews things in case you didn't get them the first time. I really loved going to his lectures. The grading was a little hard but the feedback was great (though I think that's mostly TA-dependant). Great Prof!!!

This Professor is one of the best professors I've had in SFU. Before this class, I used to hate horror literature, and now I ENJOY IT!! If you ever need to take an English course, you NEED to take it with him. He's tough on grading, but I learned a LOT from his lectures and the thorough feedbacks.  A M A Z I N G  CLASS!!!

Professor. Everton lectures are very captivating and well thought out He was very clear on what you would be tested on and there were no surprises on the final exam. He is fun and hilarious. However, is grading is difficult but you will see an improvement in your writing by the end of the term. Show up to class and show up to office hours.

Dr. Everton is very engaged in his lectures, has a great sense of humour, and always has a very structured course. Although the grading criteria is tough, it is fair. Don't try to ask questions during class though, he probably won't answer them. Overall, very interesting lectures and easy to understand.
Super engaging and funny. Class flies by! The lectures are super focused and thought out. He finds knows how to make english entertaining and enjoyable!
